The situation is following: I have changed OS from win98 to winXP.Under 98 I 
have had a nicely configured block of Apache 1.3 + PHP4 + mySQL running.As I 
began to configure the same pack under XP I have faced the problem that as far 
as I define Document Root Apache runs smoothly - any *.html or *.cgi downloads 
- no problem, BUT as soon as I add the strings:
LoadModule e:/some_dir/php/sapi/php4apache.dll 
...... 
Clear Module List 
AddModule mod_php4.c 
AddType........ 
Apache either "unexpecnedly quits" (nothing's written into error log) either 
postes the error message "AddModule is not a valid command..."
The same problem occures with different versions of Apache & PHP.
